p: SHNP homology model and the prediction of its electrostatic surface are shown in Figs 3A and 2B. The spatial location and shape of predicted linear peptides—SHNP (G72-D110) ( Fig 3C), SHNP (P251-D264) ( Fig 3D) and SHNP (I266-A283) ( Fig 3E)—were demonstrated in the model generated. When performing an analysis of the location of the peptides in front of the electrostatic surface of the predicted protein, it is possible to verify that the peptide SHNP (G72-D110) ( Fig 3C) is at a more electronegative region (red) than SHNP (P251-D264) ( Fig 3D) and SHNP (I266-A283) ( Fig 3E) peptides, which are in a more neutral/electropositive region.
